# Superkabe

> Infrastructure protection layer for outbound email teams. Monitors bounce rates, DNS authentication, mailbox fatigue, and lead health in real time to prevent domain burnout and protect sender reputation.

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/getting-started): Set up Superkabe to protect your outbound infrastructure
- [Clay Integration](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/clay-integration): Connect Clay tables for automated lead routing
- [Smartlead Integration](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/smartlead-integration): Real-time bounce monitoring and mailbox protection
- [EmailBison Integration](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/emailbison-integration): Warm-up metrics and reputation scoring
- [Instantly Integration](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/instantly-integration): Sync campaigns and monitor deliverability
- [Slack Integration](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/slack-integration): Real-time infrastructure alerts in your channels
- [API Integration](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/api-integration): Clay webhooks, Smartlead monitoring, and direct lead ingestion API
- [Multi-Platform Sync](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/multi-platform-sync): Parallel data sync across Smartlead, EmailBison, and Clay

## Core Concepts

- [Platform Rules](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/platform-rules): Automated rules, thresholds, and enforcement mechanisms
- [Monitoring System](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/monitoring): Tiered thresholds, sliding windows, and domain protection
- [Execution Gate](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/execution-gate): Lead processing gate with failure classification
- [Risk Scoring](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/risk-scoring): Hard and soft signal separation for risk assessment
- [Technical Architecture](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/technical-architecture): System architecture and infrastructure design
- [State Machine](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/state-machine): Mailbox and domain state transitions

## Configuration

- [Configuration](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/configuration): Integration setup and threshold tuning
- [Deployment](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/deployment): Production deployment checklist
- [Infrastructure Assessment](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/infrastructure-assessment): Automated health checks for sending infrastructure
- [Warmup Recovery](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/warmup-recovery): Automated mailbox healing via warmup

## Help Center

- [Connection Errors](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/help/connection-errors): Troubleshoot disconnected mailboxes
- [Campaign Paused](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/help/campaign-paused): Why campaigns are paused and how to resume
- [Auto-Healing](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/help/auto-healing): 5-phase automatic recovery pipeline
- [Infrastructure Score](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/help/infrastructure-score-explained): Score vs status explained
- [24/7 Monitoring](https://www.superkabe.com/docs/help/24-7-monitoring): Continuous infrastructure monitoring

## Blog

- [Email Deliverability Guide](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/email-deliverability-guide): Comprehensive guide to protecting outbound email deliverability
- [How Spam Filters Work](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/how-spam-filters-work): How ISP spam filters evaluate emails and how to avoid the spam folder
- [Deliverability Tools Compared](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/email-deliverability-tools-compared): Compare email deliverability monitoring, reputation, and protection tools
- [Bounce Rate & Deliverability](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/bounce-rate-deliverability): How bounce rates damage sender reputation and how to prevent it
- [SPF, DKIM, DMARC Explained](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/spf-dkim-dmarc-explained): Step-by-step DNS authentication setup for outbound teams
- [Domain Warming Methodology](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/domain-warming-methodology): How to safely warm up new outbound email domains
- [Email Reputation Lifecycle](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/email-reputation-lifecycle): How sender reputation is built, damaged, and repaired
- [Infrastructure Assessment Guide](https://www.superkabe.com/blog/introducing-infrastructure-assessment): Assess your email infrastructure before your first campaign

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://www.superkabe.com): Main landing page
- [Pricing](https://www.superkabe.com/pricing): Plans and pricing
- [Product](https://www.superkabe.com/product): Product overview and feature pages
- [Infrastructure Playbook](https://www.superkabe.com/infrastructure-playbook): A-Z guide on outbound deliverability
- [Technical Manifesto](https://www.superkabe.com/open-source): Technical breakdown of Superkabe architecture
- [Blog](https://www.superkabe.com/blog): Technical guides on email deliverability
